reviews.text: It could have been good, just not this way. What Breaking Bad attempts is in theory, an interesting experiment. It tries to pick up the thread left dangling at the end of cobra kai, while also trying to a completely separate reboot from 2005 that never quite earned its place in the franchise. The result is a film that lo...
